item.title: MovieReviewApp
item.description:
MovieReviewApp

Description: Last web challenge done in the ctf (unfortunately) also one of the fastest to do if you know the right tools

Introduction

The challenge looks like a very simple site in pure html where we see reviews on movies

Source

Is not present the source BUT…

Solution

First thing that stands out is that in the url there are extensions so we understand that probably the system behind it is not very complex in fact going to the root endpoint we notice
